Description: Net-sinker made of dark grey steatite, oval in section, it is broken off at one end. The preserved end is rounded and shows one groove cut at the end. On the outside a second shorter cut. In the middle at the edges each a notch and at the end that is broken up the beginning of a notch is visible as well. The surface is polished.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound β, D15.R
